reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and feminine, comfortable, and of nice quality, with one customer noting it's particularly flattering for larger chests. The color receives positive feedback, with one mentioning the top and bottom are different shades. The fit and material quality receive mixed reviews - while some find it true to size, others say it runs slightly small, and while some like the fabric, others find it thin and not worth the price. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and cute!
items.body: This dress is lightweight and comfortable! It comes very wrinkled so a quick wash or ironing is needed before wearing. Purchased the black/blue and love the color! With the bottom material not being stretchy I purchased the XL, since my extra weight is more in my lower half, and it fits decently well. It’s a smidge loose under my armpits but not enough for others to notice. I’m 5’7” to help give an idea on length of the dress. I will definitely get good use out of it. I think it will be easy to dress up or down with styling so it’s nice to have that option! It does have slits on both sides- I was able to wear my short leggings underneath but if you’re a slip-wearing person, it will need to be short or it will show when you sit. Read more
items.author: Jennifer N

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!
items.body: Perfect dress for summer. Material is nice and style is fabulous. The design helps hide the tummy area. I got the Navy and I love it! Wore it to 2 summer weddings. Size was perfect. Read more
items.author: Josh Chomiczewski

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Hawaiian dress!
items.body: Cute and fits great! Will be perfect for our trip to Hawaii coming up! It doesn’t have a slit up the front like it shows online. Rather, the slit is on the side. There are also ruffles on each side which I didn’t see when I bought it but they are cute. Would be 5 stars if it had pockets and maybe no ruffles. But I’m keeping!! True to size. Read more
items.author: RunAllTheTrails

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Same two dresses Inconsistent Size and Construction
items.body: I bought this dress in 2 colors (black/rose) and (navy/white). Both choices are beautiful. Here’s the issue. I am 5’4, 123 lbs and wear a small. The Navy dress fit perfectly and was lovely. The bodice fit is very comfortable. The navy dress has a slip lining. I’ll give the navy dress five stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ The black and rose dress, also beautiful had a bodice that fit like an XS, not a small. It was so tight and was really uncomfortable. There was NO slip lining in this dress, even though both dresses are made by the same company. Why are these dresses so different? I’m going to return the black and rose dress and repurchase it, hoping to get a fit like the navy dress. If not, I’ll return it. The same two dresses shouldn’t be so different from one another. Read more
items.author: L. Christianson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Perfect – Ideal for Graduation!
items.body: I bought the BTFBM sleeveless summer dress for my graduation, and it was absolutely perfect! The fit is flattering without being too tight, and the flowy A-line shape gave it a soft, elegant look. The floral pattern and V-neck added just the right amount of charm, and I felt confident and comfortable all day. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, which was great for a warm day, and the dress moved beautifully as I walked Read more
items.author: Courtney Sanders

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfortable dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress and comfortable to wear. I purchased the dress with the black bodice and floral skirt. The fabrics used are a nice quality. I like the side zip for easy on and off. The skirt is light and flowy, yet not see through. The floral material is edged with a black serge stitching which is visible. The fit is great. The fabric top has some stretch adding to a flattering fit. After traveling with this dress in my suitcase, the top was wrinkle free while the lower skirt needed steaming for creases. Read more
items.author: Thomas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning
items.body: Absolutely beautiful dress. It does run small so size up. Skirt material is pretty thin so know you need a slip or shape wear for underneath. Slit is a great length. Read more
items.author: Shopstoomuch

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value. Pretty evening summer dress.
items.body: I like the way the top fits me, and the bottom is lightweight and comfortable. Pretty blue color. No issues for me. Read more
items.author: Karen P.

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Big Floral White Navy, Pink Floral Navy, Floral Purple, Big Floral Lake Blue, Big Floral White Wine Red, White Floral Black, Big Floral Dark Green, Floral Black, Big Floral Green, Floral Black Blue, Big Floral Multicolor, Big Floral Rose Red, Striped, Big Floral Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
